attributes.action: Support the national hate crime officer network in identifying issues of inequality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "We state for the attention of the responsible senior hate crime officer of London Metropolitan Police our   lack of confidence in the London Metropolitan police because of a dereliction of a duty of care and a failure to maintain policies responsible for the protection of community and individuals.  We believe there is an insult to human dignity where the incitement to violence and murder of LGBT community members is seen as a lesser crime to that of incitement to violence and murder. Racist artists are banned on the grounds that they are a threat to public order and good community relations. The current situation offering double standards in London Metropolitan police operations is unacceptable. The support by the London Metropolitan Police for perfomances by artists recorded as using 'Murder Lyrics' against members of the wider community is unacceptable."
